properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 12 at 8:39PM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
The recent full moon will create below normal water levels
offshore tonight, mainly between 2 AM and 4 AM EST. Mariners
should use extra caution while watching for sandbars and wave
shoaling. The slowest safe navigable speed is advised along the
center channel lines and near area shorelines.

NWSheadline: Below average water levels expected overnight
